detailed_design.description: Add comprehensive API documentation using OpenAPI/Swagger. Currently no API documentation exists. Generate interactive API docs, document all endpoints, add example requests/responses, and include authentication details.
detailed_design.solution: 1. Add FastAPI automatic OpenAPI generation. 2. Add detailed docstrings to all endpoints. 3. Add request/response models with examples. 4. Configure Swagger UI and ReDoc. 5. Document authentication. 6. Add API usage guide.

user_stories.story: As a frontend developer, I want API documentation to understand available endpoints.
As an integrator, I want example requests/responses to test the API.
